headline: Heard on the Street Recap: AI Trade Down
summary: What Happened in Markets Today: Techs sell off—again. Two days don't make a trend, but investors definitely seem to be having second thoughts on the market's recent AI-fueled upswing. All eight tech companies sporting market values over $1 trillion closed another day in the red Wednesday.

All eight tech companies sporting market values over $1 trillion closed another day in the red Wednesday.

headline: Why Broadcom (AVGO) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of fabless chip and software maker Broadcom (NASDAQ:AVGO) fell 3.1% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to pull back, with technology stocks accounting for most of the market's largest decliners. A key reason for this trend is that much of the recent market gains were concentrated in the "AI trade," which includes these large technology and semiconductor companies. So this could also mean that some investors are locking in some gains ahead of more definitive feedbac

headline: Palantir sinks lower, chip stocks fall, Trump admin & chipmakers
summary: Julie Hyman examines some of the top stories of the day on Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. Palantir (PLTR) stock extends recent losses. The stock, which is the S&P 500's (^GSPC) worst performer this week, is on track to record its sixth day in the red. Chip stocks, including Nvidia (NVDA), AMD (AMD), and Broadcom (AVGO), are also under pressure amid a continued tech sell-off. The Trump administration is reportedly weighing taking an equity stake in Intel (INTC) and other chipmakers, according to reporting from Reuters Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Vectara Selected by Broadcom to Provide Agentic Conversational AI Customer Service Solution to Support Enterprise Clients
summary: Vectara, the trusted platform for AI-powered agents & assistants, today announced that it has been selected by Broadcom, a global leader in semiconductor and infrastructure software solutions, to provide an end-to-end conversational AI customer service solution supporting Broadcom's enterprise clients.
